title: Piz Maler
text: Piz Maler is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, located south of <a href="Sedrun">Sedrun</a> in the canton of <a href="Graub%C3%BCnden">Graubünden</a>. It lies at the northern end of the range between <a href="Lai%20da%20Curnera">Lai da Curnera</a> and <a href="Lai%20da%20Nalps">Lai da Nalps</a>.
